net.tridentsdk.server.concurrent

Class MainThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • net.tridentsdk.server.concurrent.MainThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    @ThreadSafe
public class MainThread
extends Thread
    Handles the running of the server, the "ticks" that occur 20 times a second
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        Thread.State, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainThread(int ticksPerSecond)
      Creates the MainThread runner from the amount of heartbeats the server should take per second the server runs

      • pauseTicking

        public boolean pauseTicking(int ticks)
        Instead of needing to be resumed, it will instead just skip this many ticks and resume
        Parameters:
        ticks - the ticks to pause for
        Returns:
        whether the server allows the pausing of ticking
        See Also:
        pauseTicking()

      • resumeTicking

        public void resumeTicking()

      • getAverageTickLength

        public double getAverageTickLength()
        Used to get the length of the average tick for the past 40 ticks

        Does not count ticks that have been skipped via MainThread#pauseTicking()

        Returns:
        the average length of a tick for the past 40 ticks
